body: Scrim servers annoy some players out. Imagine having 10 players online at 4:00 PST PM and everyone wants to practice. Guess what. Can't get a scrim server until an hour has passed. Now what if the scrim servers were more flexible with time? Maybe every scrim server should be one hour long each? Then before it runs out, you get the one for the next hour.

replies.body:
As much as I'd like to host 100 more scrim servers, that's just not plausible. Even hosting for the active teams is too much. And if we restrict it to only current tournament teams, well that's not fun for the others that would like to use a private server.

We're always open to suggestions on this, I haven't gotten much feedback at all.

replies.body: I understand the issue about adding more servers, but what about converting servers that are not used, into scrim servers. For example, we only need 2 walls servers maximum. How about converting the rest into private team scrim servers. Also, the sg servers are too many compared to the amount of people that play the game. How about converting all of those apart from 2. Infact, every game mode apart from nebula could still cope with 2 servers. And some nebula servers could still be converted.
